element.name: salesCalc
element.sql: INSERT INTO ttfoundquantity (storeloc, article, quantity) SELECT tl.id, s.article, SUM (DECODE (d.doctype, 'CS', 1, -1) * s.quantity) qty FROM ttloclist tl, supermag.smspec s, supermag.smdocuments d WHERE d.doctype IN ('CS', 'CR') AND tl.id IN (d.locationfrom, d.locationto) AND d.createdat BETWEEN TO_DATE ( :pFrom , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE ( :pTo , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND d.docstate IN (2, 3) AND s.doctype = d.doctype AND s.docid = d.id AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ttidgroup tg WHERE tg.article = s.article) GROUP BY tl.id, s.article

element.name: rpdays
element.sql: SELECT (TO_DATE ( :pTo , 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE ( :pFrom , 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) days, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ( :pFrom , 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD.MM.YYYY') || ' по ' || TO_CHAR (TO_DATE ( :pTo , 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD.MM.YYYY') speriod FROM DUAL

element.name: rprow
element.sql: SELECT ca.id grpid, ca.tree || ' ' || ca.name grpname, c.article, c.shortname caption, c.mesabbrev ei, am_getarticlebarcodes (c.article) bars FROM svcardname c, ttidgroup tc, sacardassort ca, smcardassort am WHERE c.article = tc.article AND ca.tree LIKE :passort || '%' AND am.idassort = ca.id AND tc.article = am.article AND c.article = am.article ORDER BY ca.tree || ' ' || ca.name, c.shortname

element.name: rpcol
element.sql: SELECT s.id, s.name caption FROM smstorelocations s WHERE s.id IN (13,30,34,47,51,56) ORDER BY s.id

element.name: rpcell
element.sql: SELECT nvl((SELECT SUM (ts.quantity) FROM ttfoundquantity ts WHERE ts.storeloc = :rpcol.id AND ts.article = :rprow.article ),0) sel, nvl((SELECT SUM (tr.quantity) FROM ttremains tr WHERE tr.storeloc = :rpcol.id AND tr.article = :rprow.article ),0) ost FROM DUAL

element.name: rpcellst
element.sql: SELECT NVL( (SELECT SUM (ts.quantity) FROM ttfoundquantity ts, smcardassort am WHERE ts.storeloc = :rpcol.id AND am.idassort = :rprow.grpid AND ts.article = am.article), 0) sel, NVL( (SELECT SUM (tr.quantity) FROM ttremains tr, smcardassort am WHERE tr.storeloc = :rpcol.id AND am.idassort = :rprow.grpid AND tr.article = am.article), 0) ost FROM DUAL
